SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.ROUT_GRP ,CONCAT(A.STAT_H, '시') AS STAT_H ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_STOP_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_STOP_TIME ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME ,A.NODE_ID ,B.NODE_NM
DATE_FORMAT(DATE(A.OPER_DT), '%m-%d') OPER_DT ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_STOP_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_STOP_TIME ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME ,A.NODE_ID ,A.ROUT_GRP ,B.NODE_NM
MONTH(A.OPER_DT) AS OPER_DT ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_STOP_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_STOP_TIME ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME ,A.ROUT_GRP ,A.NODE_ID ,B.NODE_NM
FROM BMS_ROUT_STTN_STOP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST B ON A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID WHERE A.NODE_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV}
GROUP BY NODE_ID, A.STAT_H ORDER BY NODE_ID, A.STAT_H ASC
GROUP BY OPER_DT, A.NODE_ID ORDER BY A.NODE_ID, OPER_DT ASC
GROUP BY A.NODE_ID ORDER BY A.NODE_ID, A.OPER_DT ASC

SELECT ROUND(A.MAX_STOP_TIME,1) AS MAX_STOP_TIME, ROUND(A.MIN_STOP_TIME,1) AS MIN_STOP_TIME,
DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.ROUT_GRP ,CONCAT(A.STAT_H, '시') AS STAT_H ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_STOP_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_STOP_TIME ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME ,A.NODE_ID ,B.NODE_NM
DATE_FORMAT(DATE(A.OPER_DT), '%m-%d') OPER_DT ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_STOP_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_STOP_TIME ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME ,A.NODE_ID ,A.ROUT_GRP ,B.NODE_NM
MONTH(A.OPER_DT) AS OPER_DT ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_STOP_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_STOP_TIME ,ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(A.AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME,0)),2) AS AVRG_ON_OFF_TIME ,A.ROUT_GRP ,A.NODE_ID ,B.NODE_NM
FROM BMS_ROUT_STTN_STOP_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST B ON A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID WHERE A.NODE_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV}
GROUP BY NODE_ID, A.STAT_H ORDER BY NODE_ID, A.STAT_H ASC
GROUP BY OPER_DT, A.NODE_ID ORDER BY A.NODE_ID, OPER_DT ASC
GROUP BY A.NODE_ID ORDER BY A.NODE_ID, A.OPER_DT ASC
